topic.title: SERDES to Ethernet PHY Resources Mapping

body.p: While the lane mapping provides flexibility for routing groups of 4-lanes, due to limitations of the Ethernet subsystem assignment of Ethernet PHY channels to Ethernet clients, line card architectures need to be planned accordingly. Careful consideration should be given to designs that leverage pluggable optical transceiver cage designs capable supporting a variety of client types and electrical lane rates to avoid blocking scenarios during cage re-configuration.
